name: createRoom
description: This method creates a new room.

parameters.name: translations
parameters.description: The name of the room in different languages. The keys are the lower case ISO 639-1 language codes and the upper case ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes seperated by a dash (e. g. en-US or fr-FR). The values are the room names in the different languages.

returnValue: Returns the ID of the new room.
